updateProfile.title: Update your profile
updateProfile.description: Make sure to update your profile with the actual values from your Pokémon Pocket app. We'll use this information to set up trades and your public collection page.

usernameDescription: Match your Pokémon Pocket display name here.
friendIDDescription: Match your Pokémon Pocket friend ID here (without dashes)
isPublicDescription: If you want to share your collection or trading page, you can do so here.
usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 2 characters.
friendIdInvalid: Friend ID is not valid, it must be 16 digits without dashes.
